# INF.CommApp Frontend - React TypeScript Healthcare Dashboard

## Project Overview
Healthcare communication system frontend built with React + TypeScript, integrating with .NET API backend for facility notifications, resident management, and staff dashboard.

## Key Features
- Real-time notifications for healthcare facilities
- Staff dashboard and resident management
- Facility-wide communication system
- Mobile-responsive design for healthcare environments
- Integration with existing .NET API backend

## Development Stack
- **Framework**: React 18 + TypeScript
- **Build Tool**: Vite
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **State Management**: React Query for API state
- **Routing**: React Router
- **Real-time**: WebSocket/SignalR integration
- **PWA**: Progressive Web App capabilities

## API Integration
Connects to existing INF.CommApp.API (.NET) backend:
- Authentication endpoints
- Notification system
- Facility, Resident, and User management
- Real-time communication channels

## Figma Integration Ready
Project structure optimized for:
- Component-based design system
- Easy integration of Figma-generated code
- Consistent healthcare UI patterns

## Development Guidelines
- Component-first architecture
- TypeScript strict mode
- Healthcare data privacy considerations
- Mobile-first responsive design
- Accessibility compliance for healthcare applications
